name: Crop Swapper
description:
Made for the Hackagong Hackathon 2014, and worked on it afterwards for a little bit with the help of Sam Gossner and Dieter Theuns.

Fill the food bar to grow your village.

Run out of food and your people will starve.

Time advances every turn, or you can click the turn icon in the top-left to advance the clock.

Supports mobile devices.
